title: What's Happening With AEye Stock?
snippet: AEye stock (NASDAQ: LIDR) had a solid July, rising by close to 240% over the month, although the stock has retraced by about 12% over the last five trading days.

title: AEye (LIDR) Stock Falters Despite Upbeat Q2 Business Developments
snippet: Shares of lidar technology developer AEye are trading lower Friday morning. The company released its second-quarter 2025 financial results.

title: AEye stock (LIDR) soars 54% after Nvidia partnership - is this the hottest AI stock on the market right now?
snippet: AEye's stock soared by 54% following the integration of its Apollo lidar system into Nvidia's DRIVE AGX platform, a key technology for self-driving vehicles. This partnership significantly boosts AEye's visibility and credibility in the autonomous driving sector.

title: Aeye shares skyrocket after NVIDIA integrates Apollo lidar into DRIVE AGX system
snippet: Aeye Inc (NASDAQ:LIDR) saw its stock jump 270% following the announcement that its flagship Apollo lidar has been fully incorporated into NVIDIA's (NASDAQ:NVDA) DRIVE AGX platform, a key element of NVIDIA's autonomous vehicle technology suite.
